model

Class Payment

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Payment

  • public class Payment
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds all the payment details for a transaction.
    Author:
    Oliver Harris.

                                      double amount,
                                      java.lang.String date)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Add payment to transaction database.
        Parameters:
        username - The username the transaction belongs to.
        amount - The amount that was paid.
        date - The date it was paid.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - The database did not update.
